#!/bin/sh
SVC_NAME=synchro-tiarhe-hro export SPRING_BATCH_JOB_NAMES=mockTiarheFtpJob
# Start Service and get ActiveEnterDate sudo systemctl start $SVC_NAME ActiveEnterDate=`systemctl show -p ActiveEnterTimestamp $SVC_NAME | awk '{print $2 " " $3}'`
# Print logs as a child process journalctl -qfu $SVC_NAME --since "$ActiveEnterDate" & CHILD_P=$!
# When Job finish kill child porocess while systemctl is-active $SVC_NAME -q; do sleep 1s done kill $CHILD_P
# Get Exit Status ExecMainStatus=`systemctl show synchro-tiarhe-hro.service -p ExecMainStatus | cut -d'=' -f 2` exit $ExecMainStatus
